alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Brevard County through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Port Saint John, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Sharpes, Port Saint John, Titusville Airport, and Playalinda Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. These types of funnel clouds are harmless, but on rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands
